alert.note: Alert for Mojave Desert Slopes; Tehachapi (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 19 at 4:55PM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN KERN COUNTY THROUGH 545 PM PDT... At 455 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles southeast of Tehachapi, or 26 miles north of Lancaster, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tehachapi, Golden Hills, Mojave, and Water Canyon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
